New Records: Zach Edey registered the first double-double of his career with 10 points and 10 rebounds.
Key Match Events: Memphis took control of the game in the third quarter and never looked back.
Edey returned to finish the contest in the fourth quarter, scoring a basket with a minute left to get his double-double.
Post-Match Reflections: The Grizzlies are hoping to get more players healthy before returning home to face the LA Lakers on Nov. 6 and the Washington Wizards on Nov. 8.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Zach Edey will get plenty of opportunity against the Lakers, possibly in a matchup with Anthony Davis.
The Grizzlies used a smaller lineup in the first half, but they went back to their bigger five to start the second.
Others: The Memphis Grizzlies continue their two-game road trip on Monday against the Brooklyn Nets.
